symptoms.name: Bloody diarrhea
symptoms.severity: Variable, can range from mild to severe
symptoms.pattern: Typically starts 1-2 days after infection, lasts 7 days

symptoms.name: Dehydration
symptoms.severity: Variable, depending on the severity of diarrhea
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to fluid loss from diarrhea

vital_signs.heart_rate: Potentially elevated due to dehydration or infection

risk_factors: Exposure to contaminated food, water, surfaces, or objects

required: Laboratory identification of Shigella bacteria in stool sample
supportive: History of exposure to contaminated food or water
